node.title: Covetable Timepieces That Give New Meaning to the Term ‘Winter Whites’
node.alt: Clockwise from left: Tag Heuer Carrera, $3,300, tagheuer.com; Rolex Oyster Perpetual Datejust 31, $45,600, rolex.com; and Omega De Ville Trésor, $5,600, omegawatches.com.
node.description: Between their sprinkling of diamonds and mother-of-pearl faces, these three watches emit a gentle glow.
node.content: ["There is something to be said for understated elegance, which with this trio of watches comes in the form of mother-of-pearl faces and diamond accents. On the dial of the Tag Heuer Carrera, the gems replace numbers to mark the time, while on Omega\u2019s De Ville Tr\u00e9sor, they wrap around the bezel. The Rolex Oyster Perpetual Datejust 31 has them in both places, but there, too, the overall effect is of a classic style with just a bit of sparkle."]
